bibl.title: In Re: Petition of H. C. Littooy for Writ of Habeas Corpus.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: National Archives and Records Administration, Seattle Branch, Washington
msIdentifier.collection: RG 21 US Circuit Courts, Western District Of Washington, Seattle; Law Register Northern Division, 1899-1906, vol2.

div1.p: United States of America Western District of Washington

I, JAMES C. DRAKE, Clerk of the Circuit Court of the United States, for the Wester District of Washinton, do hereby certify that the foregoing attached papers constitute the JUDGEMENT ROLL in the foregoing entitled cause, No. 1207 wherein In Re: Petition of H. C. Littoy Writ of Habeas Corpus
As Testimony Whereof, I have hereunto set my hand and affixed the Seal of said Circuit Court, this the 16 day of Dec A.D. 1911
By B. O. Wright, Deputy Clerk.
